column4: hi folks i am trying to upgrade Konversation on my breezy system -- i have the deb file -- how do I make synaptic use that to upgrade it?
all you have to do is sudo apt-get install konversation.  you don't need to download a .deb file yourself
.19 does not appear to be in synaptic -- it says the latest avail is .18
yes, it has a few bugfixes in it that i want unless i will endanger my system by installing it
don't try compiling conversation yourself, the dependencies are outrageous
ok - thanks a bunch - -i appreciate the warning - - back to .18
dpkg -i the 0.19 .deb file or upgrade to dapper
i'll wait till i switch the system to gentoo and do it from there
